Katrina Kaif Looks Breathtakingly Beautiful In These Gorgeous Pictures
Katrina Kaif Looks Breathtakingly Beautiful In These Gorgeous Pictures
Katrina Kaif is one of the most-sought Bollywood actress in Bollywood at the moment. Born on July 16, 1984, Katrina began her modelling career at the age of 14.Katrina made her acting debut in 2003 with 'Boom' which was directed by Kaizad Gustad. Katrina started giving hits like Maine Pyaar Kyun Kiya (2005) and Namastey London (2007). It was finally her powerful role in New York (2009) that earned her a filmfare nomination for Best Actress.
After that, she continued to achieve commercial success with movies like Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani (2009), Raajneeti (2010) and Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara (2011). With Ek Tha Tiger (2012) and its sequel Tiger Zinda Hai (2017) along with Dhoom 3 (2013), she proved her mettle once again. These films went on to become Bollywood's top grossing movies of all time.
